definition: to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: Yang xia worry about children to early love.
Nagging serves no useful purpose for preventing puppy love.
sentences.chinese: 沒完沒了的說教對於防止孩子們早戀毫無用處。

sentences.english: So it is not suitable for them to have the puppy love.
sentences.chinese: 因此早戀對他們來說是不適合的。

sentences.english: It’s different from puppy love before college.
sentences.chinese: 這與升入大學之前的早戀不同。

sentences.english: I agree, puppy love is normal and should not be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 我同意，早戀是正常的，應該沒有問題。

sentences.english: I had my puppy love in the university.
sentences.chinese: 我同意，早戀是正常的，應該沒有問題。

sentences.english: Heilongjiang is the first province to so legislate.
sentences.chinese: 黑龍江省成爲首個對“早戀”問題進行立法的省。

definition: to be made to stand still as a punishment
to follow bad examples/to be corrupted by bad examples
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
to act willfully and make a scene/to make trouble
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
to take troubles to heart (idiom); brooding
